item.title: LeapMotionRelative
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. Leap Motion Introduce Leap Motion是一种检测和跟踪hands, fingers and finger-like tools的设备。该设备在一个较近的环境中操作，精度高，跟踪帧速率高。Leap Motion 视野
